summary: A test suite that validates the functionality of the NashMDTrainer component, checking that model training proceeds correctly under standard conditions as well as when using parameter‑efficient fine‑tuning (PEFT), reference models, and custom PEFT configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the machine‑learning training pipeline by automatically detecting regressions or misconfigurations in the NashMDTrainer, thereby supporting robust deployment of fine‑tuned models.
